We Need Call centre to sell WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT AND WEB HOSTING (Payout FIX seating at $800/month)

1.You will be paid $800 per staff or seat dialing for COMPANY.

2. Minimum 1 sales per day per agent

3. In case your agents/staff can make sales above 1 spd (that is 22 sales per month), we will pay you an additional $10 per sale (23rd sales and up).contact-admin@eshreya.com
